attributes.background: Young people of this country now elidable to vote do not want to leave EU

rejection.details:
Petitions need to call on the UK Government or Parliament to take a specific action.

We're not sure exactly what you'd like the Government or Parliament to do. 

You could start a new petition explaining clearly what you would like the Government or Parliament to do.

If you want to have a second referendum on Britain leaving the EU, you may wish to sign this petition instead: 
https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/231461
